title: Do Not Disable The SSL/TLS Validation from your Spring Boot App, Seriously!
briefSummary: A comprehensive guide explaining why disabling SSL/TLS validation is dangerous and how the Java Development Kit manages secure HTTPS communication in Spring Boot applications.

briefSummary: Day 1 of a 29-day PyTorch journey introducing the deep learning framework and tensor basics with examples combining financial, social, and political topics.

title: Why MITRE Matters in Cybersecurity
briefSummary: Exploring MITRE's critical role in cybersecurity, including the ATT&CK framework and CVE system, and why recent funding cuts are concerning for digital security.

title: Critical Thinking: A Well-Kept Secret
briefSummary: A commentary on how critical thinking has never been properly taught in schools and how the rise of generative AI has highlighted this gap.

title: While I definitely agree on this, in some places this is virtually impossible

title: Python Project Structure Best Practices

title: As the saying says - there is no such thing as a small change in a big system
briefSummary: A short reflection on the complexity and cascading effects of making changes in large software systems.

title: That's right, it's not about lines of code; this is measured in number of commits
briefSummary: A commentary on measuring developer productivity through commits rather than lines of code written.

title: While this is a great advice, it's really applicable to any role and any profession
briefSummary: A response highlighting how certain professional advice transcends specific roles and applies universally across professions.
